title: OmniVision Set for Hong Kong Debut After $616 Million Offering
description: Hong Kong is set to add another chip designer to its bourse, as a wave of Chinese artificial-intelligence companies races to tap capital in the financial hub for expansion.
content: Hong Kong is set to add another chip designer to its bourse, as a wave of Chinese artificial-intelligence companies races to tap capital in the financial hub for expansion.
